content: supplies needed two 5-ounce skeins worsted weight yarn gray such as red heart super saver in grey heather $6 walmart size j crochet hook blunt-end yarn needle this version uses 2 strands of aran yarn & smaller hook than the other version of owl basket crochet bulky version /patterns/library/owl-basket-crochet-bulky-version which uses 4 strands of bulky & a larger hook gauge 6 row and 8 half_double_crochet = 3
